entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
